name: Rune Factory 4 Special
description:
See what the heart-pounding newlywed life has in store for you, new to
this version of the game! Available in 2019. >> Experience this
legendary fantasy adventure like never before and embark on exciting
escapades with your favorite characters in the brand new Newlywed Mode!
Coming 2019.

Features:

Explore an expansive fantasy world, reborn in gorgeous HD!

Experience special episodes with your spouse in the brand new
"Newlywed Mode"

Even seasoned players can challenge themselves with a new difficulty
mode

Enjoy new in-game cutscenes and an updated opening movie
